title: Norman Finkelstein MUST-SEE Take On Israel-Palestine
description:
Today is political scientist and author, Norman Finkelstein. You can order Norman’s new book I’ll Burn That Bridge When I Get To It: Heretical Thoughts on Identity Politics, Cancel Culture, and Academic Freedom at https://www.normanfinkelstein.com. We will be talking about Operation Protective Edges, the ceasefire in Gaza & challenged him on the arguments posed by his critics.

Support Me Directly HERE: https://rb.rumble.com

WATCH me LIVE weekdays on Rumble: https://bit.ly/russellbrand-rumble
